meanings.sent1: I saw beautiful lithographies at the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: She collected rare lithographies from famous artists.
meanings.sent3: The lithographies on the wall seemed to come alive with color.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with lithographies, turning it into a mini art museum.
meanings.sent5: The lithographies captured the essence of nature in stunning detail.

meanings.definition: Lithographies: the process of making prints using a flat stone or metal plate.
meanings.sent1: The artist learned lithographies to create unique prints.
meanings.sent2: Lithographies require precision and skill to produce high-quality prints.
meanings.sent3: During the lithographies class, the students accidentally used the wrong stone.
meanings.sent4: The workshop buzzed with excitement as they experimented with lithographies.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the lithographies being made echoed through the studio.
